actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

features.name: Nimble Escape
features.description: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter a creature's space. Each creature in the cube's space must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.

features.name: Transparent
features.description: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it is difficult to spot without a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check.
